body:
Yup
Overrated Games In My Opinion:
Angry Birds(Sucks anyway)
Grand Theft Auto Series(People treat it like god)
Minecraft(Not as good as people say it is)
Call Of Duty Series(People treat it like god)
Clash Of Clans(Sucks anyway)
Half-Life Series(People treat it like god)
Titanfall(People treat it like god)
Most of them IMO

You practically mentioned most big games :P.
They arent exactly overrated if people LIKE playing them, kind of a pointless statement here....
